profileText: a Representative from New York; born in Endicott, Broome County, N.Y., January 21, 1981; graduated from Union-Endicott High School, Endicott, N.Y.; B.A., College of William and Mary, Williamsburg, Va., 2003; J.D., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 2007; staff, United States Department of Labor; law clerk, United States Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit; staff, United States Senator Al Franken of Minnesota, 2011-2014; lawyer; unsuccessful candidate for election to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress in 2022; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress (January 3, 2025-present).
